thread.title: Kylie Jenner hides her face at jewelry store with Tyga | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner hides her face at jewelry store with Tyga | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.Com
title: Kylie Jenner hides her face at jewelry store with Tyga | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share She concealed her face under a white baseball cap with her hair tied back, that she eventually pulled her hood up over to provide even more coverage. The cosmetics mogul carried a sporty Louis Vuitton cross body bag, also color-coordinated in black and red. Saving face: The famous couple laughed and smiled while Kylie hid her face under a baseball cap as they made their way through the parking lot together Tyga, 27, whose legal name is Micheal Ray Stevenson, must have got the Kardashian memo on maroon outfits, because that's what he was dressed in from head to toe. He wore track pants with stripes down the side and a long-sleeve shirt with a dragon print on the front, both in the shade of crimson. The rapper sported a fresh hair cut and a huge grin as he carried a rather large jewelry box in hand. Maroon man: Tyga, 27, whose legal name is Micheal Ray Stevenson, must have got the Kardashian memo on maroon outfits, because that's what he was dressed in from head to toe Also Tuesday, Kylie unveiled her Valentine's Day edition 'PR' packages on her Snap story. The set is complete with hearts, confetti and Hershey's kisses in the packaging, to set off the matte liquid lipsticks, liner and other Kylie Cosmetics goodies inside. Based on her Snap story, lucky momager Kris Jenner can count on one of her own this February 14. The collection goes on sale on February 2 for the public. Marketing machine: Also Tuesday, Kylie unveiled her Valentine's Day edition 'PR' packages on her Snap story Lucky mom!
